[[Petrus of Thorolund]] - Drop |atk-physical = 14 |atk-magic = 0 |atk-fire = 0 |atk-lightning = 0 |critical = 100 |res-physical = 26 |res-magic = 8 |res-fire = 20 |res-lightning = 20 |stability = 16 |mag-adjust = 102 - 234 |str-bonus = - |dex-bonus = - |int-bonus = - |fth-bonus = A |str-req = 4 |dex-req = - |int-req = - |fth-req = 16 |weight = 0.3 |durability = 50 |weapon-type = Talisman |atk-type = [[Strike]] |notes = - }} {{For|the [[Dark Souls III]] variant|Saint's Talisman}} '''Ivory Talisman '''is a [[talismans|talisman]] in ''[[Dark Souls]]''. {{Description |First paragraph = Medium for casting miracles of the Gods. Ivory Talismans are granted only to female clerics, and their value is affected dramatically by their owner's faith.}} ==Availability == [[Reah of Thorolund]] drops it upon death. If [[Petrus of Thorolund]] had killed her already, then he drops it instead. ==Characteristics== The Ivory Talisman has the second-highest potential magic adjust of all the talismans, tying with the [[Sunlight Talisman]] and losing only to the [[Darkmoon Talisman]]. Along with the Sunlight Talisman, it is better than all other talismans bar the Darkmoon Talisman after [[Faith (Dark Souls)|Faith]] level 43. Should players not want to bother with the [[Blade of the Darkmoon]], this may well end up being the best talisman for them to use. ==Magic Adjust== {| class="article-table rounded" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="text-align:center; width:400px;" |- ! style="text-align:center; border-radius:10px 0 0 0; width:50%;" |[[Faith (Dark Souls)|Faith]] ! style="text-align:center; border-radius:0 10px 0 0; width:50%;" |Magic Adjust |- |16 |102 |- |20 |113 |- |25 |131 |- |30 |149 |- |35 |167 |- |40 |185 |- |45 |203 |- |50 |221 |- | style="border-bottom:0px;" |99 | style="border-bottom:0px;" |234 |} Reah Talisman.png {{TalismansNav}}
